newest.message:
# Release v4.0.12
## New Features - Available industry jobs per character can be displayed on the overview - Omega/Alpha status can be overridden on a per-character basis if automatic detection reports "Unknown"
## Bug Fixes - Occasional crashes fixed when reading EVE mail and notification messages
## Contributors - Peter Han - wvdvegt - rayanth - zhlzhl123

release.message:
# Release v4.0.12
## New Features - Available industry jobs per character can be displayed on the overview - Omega/Alpha status can be overridden on a per-character basis if automatic detection reports "Unknown"
## Bug Fixes - Occasional crashes fixed when reading EVE mail and notification messages
## Contributors - Peter Han - wvdvegt - rayanth - zhlzhl123
